msbt.message: Hey now, is that It is! It's the treasure I buried! I'll just take that now, .
Even after time ran out, you never gave up on finding it and bringing it back to me That's what I like about you, . Commitment to the point of obsession.
You, uh, doing OK? We were right in the middle of that treasure hunt and then WHOOSH! You were gone!Can you teach me how to do that in reverse? I want to make a big entrance at my next party. Ha HA!
